function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collaborative learning without social distancing in classrooms","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission among students","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Centralized ventilation systems with air exchange, moveable partition walls","People":"Students, teachers, school staff","Owner":"School districts, Departments of Education"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in school facilities","Impact":"Higher rates of infection due to poor air circulation","Mitigation":"Retrofitting existing buildings with appropriate ventilation systems, or designing new builds with ventilation in mind","Technologies":"Desk-based extraction, floor-level extraction through mid-floor grilles","People":"Students, teachers, school staff","Owner":"School districts, Departments of Education"},{"Description":"High-density layouts in supermarkets","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to crowded aisles and decreased social distancing","Mitigation":"Reconfiguring store layouts to allow for better circulation and social distancing, promoting online ordering and delivery","Technologies":"Reconfigurable store layouts, online ordering systems, delivery services","People":"Shoppers, supermarket staff","Owner":"Supermarket management"}]}
